rules_text:
Vigilance, reach
[i]Beauty[/i] – Whenever Selphina, Beautiful Bow Knight attacks, you may untap target defending creature. That creature must block this turn if able.
[i]Killer Bow[/i] – Whenever an Archer or Knight you control deals combat damage to a creature, support 1.
[i]Blessed Bow[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, you gain 1 life for each Archer you control.
